skins.shipDescription: Second ship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers, Nachi.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Nachi, second ship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers. Though I said second ship, I am no "little sister". I fought my way all around the Pacific, and served as flagship multiple times. I am greatest heavy cruiser - bear witness to my elegance and power!
skins.acquisition: I'm Nachi, the first post-treaty heavy cruiser from the Sakura Empire. My design is the very definition of perfection! I'll be in your care from here on out!
skins.login: I-I'm not training.. I'm just... being lazy and laughing at the other girls as they work up a sweat.
skins.details: What is it? Do you want to be my lackey?
skins.secretaryIdle1: My sisters in the Fifth Fleet? I miss them a bit... err, just once in a blue moon!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ghosts on the training ground? W-what are you, a kid? Who'd believe something like that?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Salt Lake City? I'm going to show her that Lady Luck doesn't bless the same person forever!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, are you feeling lonely? I just happen to have more spare time than I know what to do with~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I-idiot... you're that fascinated with me? At least tell me in advance...
